data.title: International Airlines Group (IAG)
data.meta_description:
International Airlines Group (IAG) | 56,281 followers on LinkedIn. International Airlines Group (IAG) is one of the world's largest airline groups  | International Airlines Group is one of the world's largest airline groups with 582 aircraft flying to more than 250 destinations and carrying around 115 million passengers in 2023.

Formed in January 2011, IAG is the parent company of Aer Lingus, British Airways, Iberia, Vueling and LEVEL. It is a Spanish registered company with shares traded on the London Stock Exchange and Spanish Stock Exchanges.

Today we announce the largest purchase of sustainable aviation fuel (SAF) ever made in Spain. More than 28,000 tonnes of SAF will be produced at Repsol Cartagena plant. This SAF will be used by Aer Lingus, British Airways, Iberia, Iberia Express and Vueling Airlines on their flights from Spanish airports. Read more here https://lnkd.in/eRR6ZwDh
